greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1; a(n+1) = the smallest prime divisor of A138793(n+1).
mathematica: b = {}; a = {}; Do[w = RealDigits[n]; w = First[w]; Do[AppendTo[a, w[[k]]], {k, 1, Length[w]}]; p = FromDigits[Reverse[a]]; AppendTo[b, First[First[FactorInteger[p]]]], {n, 1, 31}]; b (* _Artur Jasinski_, Apr 04 2008 *)
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Apr 04 2008
